hero.title: Wetsuit & Snorkeling Equipment Rental
hero.subtitle:
One less worry on your trip to Galápagos!

We have over 100 snorkeling equipment, fins, short and long wetsuits (3mm), reserve them online with an initial payment, and optimize your time in the Galápagos Islands.
hero.description: Rent it by the day or for as long as you want, pick it up on Santa Cruz Island and you can return it on Santa Cruz Island or San Cristóbal.

checkout.title: Complete Purchase
checkout.paymentProblem: There was a problem with your payment
checkout.cancellationPolicies: Cancellation Policies of Wetsuits and Snorkeling Equipment
checkout.policiesRequired: You must accept the cancellation policies to continue
checkout.cancellationPoliciesText: By making a Reservation, you accept the applicable policies for renting your wetsuit and snorkeling equipment. The initial payment will be made only with debit or credit card, to confirm 100% of the equipment reservation. You can cancel your equipment reservation within 30 business days before the pickup date to receive a refund of the initial payment, less than 30 days the initial payment will be charged as a penalty. If you think you won't arrive on time, contact the agency manager and tell them when you will arrive so they don't cancel your Reservation. You are also responsible for damages or losses of rented equipment, so on pickup day the operator will ask for a guarantee that will be charged to a credit card and the return will be automatic.

confirmation.title: Thank you for trusting ChokoTrip!
confirmation.subtitle: Your order has been confirmed
confirmation.emailSent: We have sent a confirmation email and pickup details to {email}
confirmation.pickupInstructionsText: We have sent information to your email about where you need to pick up your equipment on Santa Cruz Island.
confirmation.customizeInstructions1: To customize your wetsuit and fins, you can visit this link:
confirmation.customizeInstructions2: to let us know the sizes you want. You can also try out different sizes on the website. We will send you this link in your confirmation email so you can do this at any time.
